personal.name: Subhadeep Dhar
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 2+ years of hands-on experience building scalable web applications through internships and personal projects. I love creating efficient, user-friendly solutions that make a real impact.

experience.description: As a SDE Intern, I focused on backend development, ensuring seamless communication between the app and APIs. I refactored the codebase to improve maintainability and scalability while optimizing the execution ow for better performance.

Worked as a Backend Developer, building a scalable system, adding critical features, and improving the UX across all platforms. Contributed to the Buybox core backend, created a scalable notication system and implemented a robust product management system.

projects.title: Compify
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive AI‑powered platform leveraging generative AI to dynamically create personalized competitive‑exam questions, deliver detailed performance analytics, and manage user authentication, dashboards, and exam tracking.

projects.title: ScoutTalk
projects.description: Built a full‑stack, Discord‑inspired web application featuring servers, channels, real‑time chat (Socket.io) and video (WebRTC/LiveKit), with role‑based access control (admin, mod, user) and advanced moderation tools.

projects.title: Codecoffee
projects.description: Built a competitive coding platform with problem creation and publishing, featuring a custom judging system that validates code submissions against open and hidden test cases for automated correct‑output verification.

projects.title: Secure Share
projects.description: Designed a secure end‑to‑end encrypted file‑sharing system with layered AES/RSA encryption, robust key management, a user‑friendly Flutter frontend, and a high‑performance Rust backend for secure file storage.
